sense.def:
Kadar človek
nurtures a young child or a young plant
, skrbi za majhnega otroka ali mlado rastlino, ko raste in se razvija.

seg.quote: ...a mother's duty to nurture her children.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
nurtures plans, ideas, or people
, skrbi, da se načrt, zamisel ali ljudje razvijajo ali postanejo uspešni.

seg.quote: After spending two years nurturing this project, Bains came to England.
